CreateAudioDeposit.document: 用户通过本接口向BTOE写入待存证的音频原文件或下载URL，BTOE对音频原文件存储后，将其Hash值存证上链。
CreateAudioDeposit.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: btoe.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAudioDeposit
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BusinessId": "as1111323311",
    "EvidenceName": "存证名称",
    "FileContent": "",
    "FileName": "",
    "EvidenceHash": "",
    "HashType": 0,
    "EvidenceDescription": "存证描述"
}
CreateAudioDeposit.title: 音频文件存证

CreateDataDeposit.document: 用户通过本接口向BTOE写入待存证的业务数据明文。
CreateDataDeposit.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: btoe.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateDataDeposit
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BusinessId": "as1111323311",
    "EvidenceInfo": "业务数据明文",
    "EvidenceName": "存证名称",
    "HashType": 0,
    "EvidenceDescription": "存证描述"
}
CreateDataDeposit.title: 业务数据明文存证

CreateHashDeposit.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1

CreateHashDepositNoCert.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: btoe.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateHashDepositNoCert
<公共请求参数>

{
    "EvidenceInfo": "34545",
    "BusinessId": "777",
    "EvidenceHash": "34543"
}
CreateHashDepositNoCert.title: 示例

CreateHashDepositNoCert.document: 用户通过本接口向BTOE写入待存证的原文数据Hash值，BTOE对业务数据Hash值存证上链。
CreateHashDepositNoCert.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: btoe.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateHashDepositNoCert
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BusinessId": "as1111323311",
    "EvidenceInfo": "业务扩展信息",
    "EvidenceHash": "数据hash"
}
CreateHashDepositNoCert.title: 哈希上链存证

CreateHashDepositNoSeal.document: 用户通过本接口向BTOE写入待存证的原文数据Hash值，BTOE对业务数据Hash值存证上链，并生成无电子签章的区块链存证电子凭证。
CreateHashDepositNoSeal.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: btoe.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateHashDepositNoSeal
<公共请求参数>

{
    "BusinessId": "as1111323311",
    "EvidenceInfo": "业务扩展信息",
    "EvidenceHash": "数据hash"
}
CreateHashDepositNoSeal.title: 示例

VerifyEvidenceBlockChainTxHash.document: 用户向BTOE核验存证结果中的区块链交易hash，核验成功后会返回存证信息
VerifyEvidenceBlockChainTxHash.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: btoe.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VerifyEvidenceBlockChainTxHash
<公共请求参数>

{
    "EvidenceTxHash": "区块链交易Hash"
}
VerifyEvidenceBlockChainTxHash.title: BTOE区块链交易hash核验

VerifyEvidenceHash.document: 用户存证内容hash向BTOE核验存证记录的真实性。
VerifyEvidenceHash.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: btoe.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: VerifyEvidenceHash
<公共请求参数>

{
    "EvidenceHash": "23eca93c271e6ecf8e24f3b0045436cc6bb7456a715c3bfc6d86fd708518de97"
}
VerifyEvidenceHash.title: BTOE存证内容hash核验
